description: A list of independently owned- and operated grocery stores which are located at or within 1 mile of Chicago's city limits. In addition, this dataset contains additional information about the size and type of food offered by the grocery store. This dataset was provided to the City of Chicago by Chicago State University.

metadata.attribution: Danny Block, Chicago State University, and Frederick Blum Neighborhood Assistance Center

name: Nearby Independent Cook County Grocery Stores
